page.title: 10HOME LIFE (1)
page.content: WE START THE DAY WITH BREAKFAST EATING CEREALS OR BACON AND EGGS PREPARED ON AN ELECTRIC COOKER. THE CHILDREN LEAVE FOR SCHOOL,MY HUSBAND GOES TO THE FARM I THEN PUT THE DIRTY CLOTHES IN THE AUTOMATIC WASHING MACHINE,WHILE THOSE ARE WASHING I VACUUM THE CARPETS AND DUST THE SURFACES OF ALL THE ROOMS, WHEN THE WASHING IS FINISHED IF THE WEATHER IS DRY I PEG THE CLOTHES ON THE LINE, IF THE WEATHER IS WET I USE THE TUMBLE DRYER. I GO OUT TO THE GARDEN TO HARVEST THE VEGETABLES AND PREPARE THEM FOR LUNCH PUTTING THE EXCESS IN THE FREEZER WHICH KEEPS THEM FRESH FOR OVER A YEAR. WHEN THE WASHING IS DRY I IRON OUT THE CREASES WITH AN ELECTRIC IRON. I THEN COOK THE LUNCH. MY HUSBAND JOINS ME FOR THIS MEAL.
